name: Doodle Search
description:
Doodle Search (Now FREE!)
Who doesn't enjoy a good word search puzzle? If you have a few minutes to kill, start up a game and find all of the words. A new puzzle is created from the dictionary of fun words, for a new experience every time.

Features in 1.4:
- Game now saved when application exits
- More Words

Features in 1.3:
- Bug Fixes

Features in 1.2:
- Larger selection of words!
- Puzzles now contain twelve words!
- Minor bug fixes
- Removed timer from promotional screen
- Ads added to game screens

Features in 1.1:
- Minor bug fixes
- Ad supported free version
- Option to toggle sound on/off

A classic pencil and paper game done in “doodle” style with original hand drawn graphics.

Doodle Search is one of the five mini games (Hangman, Battleship, Tic Tac Toe and Dots) found in Doodle Games. If you like Doodle Search, check out Doodle Games in the AppStore! Doodle Games is a collection of some of your favorite pencil and paper games, brought to life on the iPhone. This is the perfect game for your next road trip, boring meeting, or family gathering.

Play DoodleGames on your iPhone and save a tree!
